    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ConnectionTimeoutException
    Exception thrown when a connection times out, such as when a client fails to acknowledge packets or respond to ping messages.
    LoggerConfig
    Utility class to configure loggers with custom formatting.
    NeonClient
    Neon protocol client implementation.
    NeonClient.TriConsumer<A,B,C>
    Functional interface for callbacks with three parameters.
    NeonClientJNI
    JNI wrapper for NeonClient to enable C/C++ integration.
    NeonConfig
    Configuration class for Project Neon networking parameters.
    NeonConfig.Builder
    Builder class for creating NeonConfig instances with a fluent API.
    NeonException
    Base exception class for all Project Neon exceptions.
    NeonHost
    Neon protocol host implementation.
    NeonHost.TriConsumer<A,B,C>
    Functional interface for callbacks with three parameters.
    NeonHostJNI
    JNI wrapper for NeonHost to enable C/C++ integration.
    NeonLogFormatter
    Custom log formatter for Project Neon that formats log messages as: [HH-MM-ss LEVEL]: Message
    NeonPacket
    Complete Neon packet with header and payload.
    NeonRelay
    Neon protocol relay server.
    NeonSocket
    UDP socket wrapper for Neon protocol operations.
    NeonSocket.ReceivedNeonPacket
    Helper record for received Neon packets.
    NeonSocket.ReceivedPacket
    Helper record for received raw packets.
    PacketHeader
    Fixed 8-byte packet header for all Neon packets.
    PacketPayload
    Base interface for all packet payloads.
    PacketPayload.Ack
     
    PacketPayload.ConnectAccept
     
    PacketPayload.ConnectDeny
     
    PacketPayload.ConnectRequest
     
    PacketPayload.DisconnectNotice
     
    PacketPayload.GamePacket
     
    PacketPayload.PacketTypeEntry
     
    PacketPayload.PacketTypeRegistry
     
    PacketPayload.Ping
     
    PacketPayload.Pong
     
    PacketPayload.ReconnectRequest
     
    PacketPayload.SessionConfig
     
    PacketType
    Core packet types for the Neon protocol.
    PacketValidationException
    Exception thrown when packet validation fails due to invalid data, malformed packets, or protocol violations.
    PublicAPI
    Indicates that a class, interface, method, or field is part of the public API and is guaranteed to remain stable across minor version updates.
    ReliablePacketManager
    Optional reliability layer for game packets.
    SessionNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a session cannot be found in the relay, typically when routing packets to non-existent sessions.
